comment._content:
Hello:
I am seeking Flickr Contacts from around the world.
If you +FOLLOW my site I will +FOLLOW your site.
We will both see each others latest photo
uploads on the Photo Sharing Page. My
site is mostly concerned with Nature.
1,020,000 hits / 1500 reciprocal followers.
Thanks Myles Green
